info.name: AuthOS - Laravel 12 Authentication Service API
info.description:
Comprehensive API collection for AuthOS - A production-ready Laravel 12 authentication service built as Auth0 alternative.

**Features:**
- OAuth 2.0 & OpenID Connect (OIDC)
- Social Authentication (Google, GitHub, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn)
- Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA/TOTP)
- Single Sign-On (SSO - OIDC + SAML 2.0)
- Multi-tenant Organization Management
- Enterprise Features (LDAP, Branding, Custom Domains, Audit, Compliance)
- User & Application Management
- Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)

**Authentication:**
Most endpoints require Bearer token authentication. Use the login endpoint to obtain an access token.

**Base URL:**
- Local (HERD): http://authos.test/api/v1
- OAuth endpoints: http://authos.test/oauth
- OIDC Discovery: http://authos.test/.well-known/openid-configuration

Link a social account to existing user
Unlink a social account from user
OIDC Discovery endpoint - provides OAuth/OIDC server configuration
OAuth 2.0 Authorization Code request with PKCE support
Exchange authorization code for access token (with PKCE)

RFC 7662 - Introspect access token validity and metadata

JSON Web Key Set for token verification

Bulk operations on users (activate, deactivate, delete)
